summary: The Wiggles are an Australian music group that makes songs for kids. They started in 1991 and are still popular today. The group has changed members over the years, but Anthony Field has been there since the beginning. They make fun music and shows with colorful costumes and characters like Dorothy the Dinosaur. The Wiggles have won many awards and are famous for making kids and grown-ups happy. They've sold lots of CDs and DVDs and perform for big crowds.
title: The Wiggles
